name: Design Your Own Tutu
description:
You pick the color- and choice of ribbon of a coordinating color or a matching flower of my choice.

This listing is also for a matching hairbow or BowBand.

IF you have a theme in mind please convo me so I can make a custom order for you. I love to be creative. Try me.

Specify at Checkout:

1. Size
2. Color of tulle and ribbon/or flower
3. Matching Hairbow on alligator clip/or french barrette
4. Or Matching Hairbow on a headband (BowBand)

Sizing

Newborn to 3 months ~ 13/14 inch waist 6/7 inch length
3 months to 6 months ~ 15/16 inch waist 7/8 length
6 months to 9 months ~16/17 inch waist 8 length
9 months to 12 months ~ 17/18 inch waist 8 inch length 
12 months to 24 months ~ 18-20 inch waist 8/9 inch length 
12 months to 24 months ~ 18-20 inch waist 10 inch length 
2 years to 3 years ~ 19-21 inch waist 10 inch length


All Tutus are hand tied by me and made to order in my smoke free studio.

Thank you for looking.

A huge thank you to my awesome photographer Ronda at Pure Photography!
